Unstuck in the middle

The scene made by the 8th grade B, called "Unstuck in the middle", was a creation made in 2025, based in the Brazilian TV show, DPA (Detetives do Prédio Azul) from 2012. The students were able to explore the technical and professional equipments for the creation of a movie! Here is a place for you to see our final creation after 4 months of preparation. Hope you enjoy!

Synopsis from the movie

A group of young detectives struggles with family tensions while discovering a mysterious secret club. Their bond is tested as strange events pull them into a surreal world. Along the way, they face unexpected challenges, hidden truths, and puzzling encounters. Friendship and identity become central as they navigate between two realities. The story blends humor, mystery, and adventure in a playful yet thought-provoking journey.
